title: Kalea 7 Pro Bundle
description:
Kalea 7 Pro Bundle

Kalea 7 is a warm, tropical escape from your hectic day-to-day because sometimes you need a little break and sometimes you need a whole new latitude. Built on the Genesis 3 female platform, Kalea is an inviting, exotic, mysterious and tropical beauty.

Ever an adventurer, Kalea 7 looks great in a jungle, forest or beach. She is at home on the promenades of Sunny Santa Monica. Her exotic beauty makes her rich and natural yet she can be ready for evening gliding into the glamour of a moonlit night.

Rest and relaxation - Mystery and adventure. Where will Kalea 7 lead you? Find your paradise in Kalea 7.

Key features of the Genesis 3-based Kalea 7 include:
Increased detail (Read More)

Kalea has increased detail in her fingers, toes, neck, mouth and chest, giving her more realistic human characteristics than previous generations.
Articulation (Read More)

One of the most significant improvements of Kalea 7 over previous generations of Daz figures is how she allows for individual movement of her ears, toes, chest, neck and abdomen. In addition, reworked rigging offers enhanced posing ability, creating incredible flexibility.
Facial expressions (Read More)

Over 60 more points of articulation in the face provide the ability to create amazing facial expressions and express realistic emotion.
Technology advancements (Read More)

New technological advancements, such as Dual Quaternion weight maps, triangle free mesh, reduce poly count and UDIM standard UVâ€™s, make Kalea 7 even more compatible with other industry standard 3D applications for ease of cross platform use.
Software Support (Read More)

The industry leading software product for leveraging the DAZ 3D models is DAZ Studio (which can be downloaded for free at Get Studio). Genesis 3 content will simply drop right into DAZ Studio seamlessly. To operate Genesis 3 content you must use the latest version of DAZ Studio available.

What is Genesis 3? Click here to find out more.

Kalea 7 measurements courtesy of Measure Metrics for DAZ Studio:

Height - 5'8" (173 cm)
Bust Circumference - 36" (91 cm)
Waist Circumference - 26" (67 cm)
Low Hip Circumference - 39" (99 cm)

What's Included and Features

This Bundle Includes:
Kalea 7
Kalea 7 Starter Bundle
Lani Hair for Genesis 3 Female(s)
Maui Days Outfit for Genesis 3 Female(s)
Shameless Rogue Outfit for Genesis 3 Female(s)
Z Beauty Poses for Kalea 7
Lilinoe for Kalea 7
Oleander Hair for Genesis 3 Female(s)
Tropical Style Outfit for Genesis 3 Female(s)
Eternal Desert Warrior Outfit for Genesis 3 Female(s)
DA Beach Girl Poses for Kalea 7
FWSA Halina HD for Kalea 7
Genesis 3 Female Anatomical Elements
